text: The Duellists is a 1977 British American historical drama movie directed by first time director Ridley Scott and was based on the short story of the same name by Joseph Conrad. It stars Harvey Keitel, Keith Carradine, Albert Finney, Edward Fox, Diana Quick, Pete Postlethwaite, Tom Conti, John McEnery, Alun Armstrong, Maurice Colbourne, Gay Hamilton and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1977 drama movies Category:1970s historical movies Category:1970s British drama movies Category:1970s American drama movies Category:Movies directed by Ridley Scott Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies set in the 1800s Category:Movies set in the 1810s Category:Movies set in France Category:Movies set in Germany Category:Movies set in Russia
title: The Duellists
